rooms.description: Two-car garage with ample space for parking and storage.
A welcoming area designed following Vastu principles to invite positive energy.
Spacious living room with floor-to-ceiling windows ensuring natural light and a Bohemian aesthetic. Adjacent dining area integrated into the space.
Modern kitchen with an open layout adjoining the living area for ease of interaction.
Cozy library featuring built-in bookshelves and soft lighting to encourage reading and relaxation.

openings.description: Large entrance door designed for ease of access while keeping security in mind.
Floor-to-ceiling window to maximize natural light and ventilation.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with a private balcony offering serene views.
Cozy secondary bedroom designed for personal comfort.
Additional bedroom space ensuring ample privacy for occupants.
Well-designed bathroom with modern fixtures and a layout following Vastu guidelines.
Dedicated closet space for efficient storage solutions.

openings.description: Balcony door providing access to a private outdoor space.
